bibl.title: A Letter from Hierax to Arsinoe: BL Papyrus 2126 (+ 2192)?
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Lond. Inv. 2126 145.4 P. Lond. Inv. 2192
C. Michael Sampson, A Letter from Hierax to Arsinoe: BL Papyrus 2126 (+ 2192?).
bibl.note: P. Lond. Inv. 2126 may belong to the same letter as P. Lond. Inv. 2192 [ed.: Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, Five Private Letters on Papyrus in the British Library, ArchPF 63 (2017) p. 143, fig.]. Arsinoite nome?, II/III CE.
bibl.seg: P. Lond. Inv. 2126 may belong to the same letter as P. Lond. Inv. 2192 [ed.: Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, Five Private Letters on Papyrus in the British Library, ArchPF 63 (2017) p. 143, fig.]. Arsinoite nome?, II/III CE.
